structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Certain Writs And Proceedings In Special Cases
Rights Of Victims And Witnesses Of Crime

law.text: Prosecutors shall not be precluded from providing, subject to appropriation, services under this chapter to any natural person or family member of such natural person who suffers direct or threatened physical, emotional or financial harm as the result of the commission or attempted commission of a crime or delinquency offense in which complaints or indictments have not been issued.
